The Quranic researcher does not think that they are the ones who are normal and resurrected to the end of what they committed from the sophistication, and the prodigy of the denial and the wonders, and there is no exile.The conquest or an alert, but rather a compound of the thunderbolt, or the exile, and the suspicion of the known meaning, (and those) is a sign of the wander Their status of their guarantee to notify the rulers of judgment that is their description; The indication of the thing is exposed to it from where it is described by his descriptions, and the destiny is not exposed to descriptions and to the permission that they are not permeated.People are full of a bias, we descend the homes of the matters referred to a sensual sign, and the meaning in the sense of the sense of the sense of their dedication in the cores of Al -Sharadah and the corruption; That is, these are not those who seek the most vigorous description that they are close to a great day that is not destined to bone; For those who think that, and if it is a weak suspicion, he hardly dares to like these doves, so how can he be sure of it.The day was described by the greatness of the greatness of what is in it, as it made it a cause for the mission by adopting what is in it, and some of them appreciated; That is: to calculate a day, and it was said: the thinking is here in the sense of the peat, and the first is first and more.And on the authority of Al -Zamakhiri, he made him worse than the infidels, because it has proven the shadow of his affairs to the atone It is proven by glory and exalted to them.What is meant is that they have sent them down a house of those who do not think that he will be corrected.
